str2: Therefore, then. Apparently a primary word; certainly, or accordingly.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: To hope, hope for, expect, trust. From elpis; to expect or confide.
To send, transmit, permit to go, put forth.
Immediately, instantly, at once. From ek and the genitive case singular feminine of autos; from that hour, i.e. Instantly.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: To look away from (something else) to, see distinctly. From apo and horao; to consider attentively.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
From the base of peran; properly, through, i.e. Around; figuratively with respect to; used in various applications, of place, cause or time.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative 1st Person Singular
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.
